name: Choose-Your-Own-Base-Spirit Piña Colada

ingredients.item: Base spirit (rum, Green Chartreuse, Campari or mezcal)

garnish: Nutmeg cube of pineapple with two pineapple leaves
preparation:
Add all ingredients to a shaker and fill with ice.
Shake, and strain into a Collins glass filled with crushed ice.
Fill the top of the glass with crushed ice and top with nutmeg.
